text: Simple playground, vast open field , accessible by all conveniently. Many brought their dogs for a walk in the park. They also provided plastic bags for dog's litter.  The bags are stowed in a transparent box attached to a lamp pole near the pavilion. Children playground at the centre of park. Bus stop directly at entrance of park.

The playground and exercise equipments are well maintained and quite clean on the whole. The neighborhood are nice and friendly. Many pet owners like to bring their companions for a walk here and can connect to the Park Connector if they want to.
It is a small park. Ahmad Ibrahim Mosque is beside the park.
Its a quiet simple playground and neighborhood fitness corner. Straying chickens and occasional squirrels lighten the atmosphere. The playground can ln definitely be improved.

Lack of traffic control vehicle causing obstruction especially on Friday prayers  noon time  the  pedestrian walkway for handicap  three or four wheel bicycle usage is always blocked by vehicle attending the prayer at the mosque inconvenience the users  2  Smoking can be  seen  all over the park and Bus stop like nobody business
